apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation
of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest
internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this
object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client
submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

certificate.description:
Certificate defines the base64 encoded APNs certificate
that is needed to establish a connection to Apple's APNs Push Servers.

description.description: Description is a human friendly description for the variant.

passphrase.description:
Passphrase defines the APNs passphrase that is needed to
establish a connection to any of Apple's APNs Push Servers.

production.description:
Production defines if a connection to production APNS server
should be used. If false, a connection to Apple's Sandbox/Development
APNs server will be established for this iOS variant.

pushApplicationId.description:
PushApplicationId is the Id of the Application that this
Variant corresponds to in the UnifiedPush Server admin UI.
